Entry-Level Account Manager Job at Dwight Patterson Consultants




        
    

        
        Dwight Patterson Consultants is a leading workforce solutions company, offering flexible placement, permanent placement, outsourcing and managed services across all sectors. Our top specialist recruitment professionals have a strong track record in their respective recruitment disciplines, specialize in providing an adaptable-people solution that responds to, and evolve with our client’s needs. Our approach imbibes complete discretion, integrity, and professionalism.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Entry-Level Account Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-Time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, or related field with 0–2 years of experience
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
	Strong communication & organizational skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: techjob@dwightpatterson.co.uk using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Job Position: Junior Social Media Manager

The Role


	We are seeking a Junior Social Media Manager who will take ownership of managing Business Insider Africa&rsquo;s social media presence across all platforms.
	This is a hands-on role where you will drive growth, boost engagement, and ensure our brand leads conversations on business and innovation in Africa.
	You&rsquo;ll work closely with the editorial, video, and design teams to deliver content that resonates and scales.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and grow Business Insider Africa&rsquo;s social media presence across Instagram, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok, and other relevant platforms.

	Track and respond to audience interactions, foster conversations, and build positive community engagement.
	Monitor trends and insights using tools like IO Analytics, CrowdTangle, Meta Business Suite, and others to optimize content strategy.
	Set and achieve clear KPIs for reach, engagement, follower growth, and conversions, reporting progress regularly.
	Analyze performance metrics and prepare weekly/monthly reports with actionable recommendations.
	Collaborate with internal teams &mdash; editorial, video, and design &mdash; to align strategies and maximize content impact.

	Propose and execute innovative strategies to improve visibility, engagement, and audience growth, reporting directly to the Head and Editor of Business Insider Africa.

	Minimum of 2 - 3 years of experience managing social media platforms, preferably in digital media, publishing, or a fast-paced content-driven environment.
	Proven track record of growing audiences and driving engagement.
	Strong copywriting, storytelling, and content creation skills.
	Proficiency with analytics tools like CrowdTangle, IO Analytics, Meta Business Suite, or similar.

	Up-to-date knowledge of social media algorithms, trends, and audience behaviors.

	Hybrid work options
	Health insurance cover
	Group life insurance cover

Junior Social Media Manager Job at Business Insider Africa




        
    

        
        Business Insider Africa is a leading digital media platform delivering in-depth reporting, analysis, and insights on business, market, leaders, careers, and lifestyle across the African continent. As part of the global Business Insider network, we are dedicated to telling the stories that matter most to Africa’s dynamic and rapidly evolving economies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Social Media Manager

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking a Junior Social Media Manager who will take ownership of managing Business Insider Africa’s social media presence across all platforms.
	This is a hands-on role where you will drive growth, boost engagement, and ensure our brand leads conversations on business and innovation in Africa.
	You’ll work closely with the editorial, video, and design teams to deliver content that resonates and scales.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and grow Business Insider Africa’s social media presence across Instagram, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok, and other relevant platforms.
	Plan, create, and schedule engaging and relevant content tailored to our audience, ensuring timely and consistent posting.
	Track and respond to audience interactions, foster conversations, and build positive community engagement.
	Monitor trends and insights using tools like IO Analytics, CrowdTangle, Meta Business Suite, and others to optimize content strategy.
	Set and achieve clear KPIs for reach, engagement, follower growth, and conversions, reporting progress regularly.
	Analyze performance metrics and prepare weekly/monthly reports with actionable recommendations.
	Collaborate with internal teams — editorial, video, and design — to align strategies and maximize content impact.
	Stay ahead of platform changes and competitor activity while introducing new content ideas and engagement tactics.
	Propose and execute innovative strategies to improve visibility, engagement, and audience growth, reporting directly to the Head and Editor of Business Insider Africa.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Mass Communication, Marketing, Journalism, Public Relations, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 - 3 years of experience managing social media platforms, preferably in digital media, publishing, or a fast-paced content-driven environment.
	Proven track record of growing audiences and driving engagement.
	Strong copywriting, storytelling, and content creation skills.
	Proficiency with analytics tools like CrowdTangle, IO Analytics, Meta Business Suite, or similar.
	Data-driven mindset with the ability to translate metrics into actionable insights.
	Up-to-date knowledge of social media algorithms, trends, and audience behaviors.
	Proactive, creative, and able to take full ownership of day-to-day execution while collaborating with multiple teams.


Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience
	Hybrid work options
	Health insurance cover
	Group life insurance cover
	Contributory pension scheme
	Annual bonuses
	Telecommunication allowance
	A dynamic and innovative environment where your work directly drives impact.
